content: this is a modification of the pattern 1 published on the iwk website this hat is favoured by the hospital nurses because of the foldable brim that gently hugs a baby s head the pattern is published to raise awareness about the period of purple crying program at the iwk health centre the purple program 2 educates parents about normal infant crying and teaches coping skills in order to prevent shaken baby syndrome 3 both striped and plain hats are made with the same pattern photography shannon bower 4 photos used with permission technical editing charlotte quiggle 1 http //www iwk nshealth ca/sites/default/files/baby_hats_for_i_w_k_%5b1%5d pdf 2 https //dontshake org/purple-crying 3 https //dontshake org/ 4 http //www shannonbower com/
